name: Vestigial (Prototype)
description:
"Strength, speed, longevity but at the cost of flesh, blood, and bone..." Escape the strange ruins and the deadly cult members that wish to sacrifice you to their god. Find the person that matters to you most. Collect and sacrifice your own limbs and organs for power, but beware the effects they may have on your body and your psyche. CONTROLS

Movement - WASD

Interact with objects - E

Submit dialogue choice - SPACE

Open Inventory - TAB

Aim and Attack, Select Sacrifice - Mouse position and Left Mouse Button click

Dash (only available while you have a leg) - F

CREDITS

ShadowCat5 - Programming, UI/UX, Audio

SouthRiverHypnos - Visuals, Narrative Design, UI

aw225 - Narrative Design, Programming (Narrative), Project Management
